text: phir shaitaan ne donon ko bahakaaya, taaki unakee sharmagaahon ko, jo un donon se chhipee theen, un donon ke saamane khol de. aur usane (ibalees ne) kaha, "tumhaare rab ne tum donon ko jo is vrksh se roka hai, to keval isalie ki aisa na ho ki tum kaheen farishte ho jao ya kahee aisa na ho ki tumhen amarata praapt ho jae.
